title: looking for a script like...
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for a script (for display uses):  
- it should look handwritten (not too much be a font)  
- a little bit messy

This is what comes close, but it's:  
- free, so with all bugs that come with that.  
- not available with caps  
- a little bit too illegigle, but still very close.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Afbeelding1_5261.png)
  
 [http://www.dafont.com/violation.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/www.dafont.com/violation.font "http://www.dafont.com/violation.font")

I've loooked at my fonts / fontshop etc, but most llok too 'artificial'.

Thanks for your help, it's really appreciated.

Marco
author: Marco

comments.content:
Hi Frode,

Thanks for the links. The sudtipos I knew, but the Charles Borges not, Looks really nice...  
Anyone else?

this is also a good example...  
More the direction I would like...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029im_/http:/typophile.com/files/depeche_mode_enjoy_the_silence_4268.jpg)
Is [Liebfraumilch](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/yanone/liebfraumilch/) too rich in contrast for your purpose?

Hi Florian,

Yes it is, but thank you very much.

Still in the freebies realm, how about [Cathy Davies' Chemist font](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/cathydavies.com/fonts.html)?  
\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_  
Ever since I chose to block pop-ups, my toaster's stopped working.

Hi dtw,

I think that one is a little too calligraphic.  
But thanks for the input,

Marco

You might wanna check out Mike Yanegaâ€™s fabulous lists:  
 [Casual Flowing Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script07Pg1.html)  
 [Casual Non-flowing Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script08Pg1.html)  
 [Everyday Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script09Pg1.html)  
 [Antique Handwriting](http://web.archive.org/web/20110922063029/http:/bowfinprintworks.com/Script10Pg1.html)  
F
I think that very sample (violation) was posted here before.
